QuestData.Title: Flame Crest
QuestData.Description: Our work here in Chiselgrip is done, mostly thanks to you. We'll now be moving on to the northeast, to Flame Crest.$b$bFlame Crest is in the cliffs, past the Ruins of Thaurissan. It should serve as a sufficient base of operations for the final stages of our plan.$b$bOf course, my son Ariok will be joining you on the road. As will I.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Kibler at Flame Crest in Burning Steppes.
